name: [Family portrait]
description:
90s-4/11/2021

Reconstruction experience.
The photo on the left shows my parents in the early nineties.

I am always wary of repeating my parents' experiences and mistakes, as if I have patterns from childhood that repeat themselves only because I chose the same path of cisgender monogamous relationships and having children. I am especially wary of my mom's sad experience, who passed away in 2009. But, of course, my parents gave me a lot of good too.

I decided to try to repeat the photo of my parents on my birthday in order to compare us.

My husband and I gave our seven-year-old son a camera, showed what should be in the picture and tell what to do and we've got into the same pose.

When the photo showed up, we laughed for a very long time. The experience is unrepeatable.
